product_name: ASICS GEL-Upshot Running Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're lifting weights, running on a treadmill or playing on the tennis court, the ASICS GEL-Upshot(TM) Running Shoes provide the support and cushioning to keep your feet comfortable. GEL-Upshot Running Shoes combine the cushioning of a traditional runner with the medial-lateral stability of a court shoe for excellent support and comfort. Extended Trusstic(R) system enhances rearfoot stability while GEL(R) cushioning systems in the rear and forefeet provide shock absorption. Grippy rubber outsoles provide traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're lifting weights, running on a treadmill or playing on the tennis court, the ASICS GEL-Upshot(TM) Running Shoes provide the support and cushioning to keep your feet comfortable.
